ability.Elemental Heart: Each time this Pokemon uses a non-Normal type moves (X-type), it becomes Normal+X type before moving.
ability.Elemental Boost: Each time of type changing, heals 1/3 of max HP and cures the status.

Neos Force.effect: If Neos gets the extra non-Normal type before using this move, it loses that extra type and boosts its Atk by one stage.

Skyrip Wing.effect: If the user's HP is lower than the target's HP, raises the user's Atk by one stage before the attack.

Echo Burst.effect: Randomly lower one of the target's stat by one stage.

Wrath of Black.effect: Ignores the target's Def stat change during the attack. Deals double damage to Fairy-type Pokemon.

Signal Buster.effect: Lowers the target's Spe by one stage. If this move is super effective to the target, paralyzes it.
